name: DEV!L EX MACHINA
description:
An epic narrative about mind hackers, Y2K, cyberspace, and love.

The year is 1999 in an alternate timeline.

Explore a rich story full of exciting twists and turns, punctuated by moving, funny and often heart-warming audio logs by strangers from around the internet, all sharing real pieces of their lives.

*This is only the prologue of a much larger narrative centred around belief systems, trauma, politics, and cyber-war.

Follow us on social media for more updates on the project.

Content Warning

This game contains themes from both the narrative and audio logs that some people may find upsetting.

Features

-Approx. 7500 words which equates to about 45 minutes to an hour of gameplay, depending on your reading speed.

-Approx. 30 minutes of audio logs.

-Exceptional 9 track OST by @GlintSerene.

-Innovative quick time event system.

Special Thanks

Special thanks to those that answered our "casting call":

Ruby Fennec

Aaron Bell

Paul Reinbach
